name: Darin's escape from reality
description:
Darin is an average highschool student that has to deal with bullying and  himself in his own way.
I didn't make any of the backgrounds! A lot of the art is inspired by Danganronpa and anime in general. I do apologize for the rushed drawings, this originally was for an English project and I had only a week to finish it. I've used a lot of references to speed up the process. It's more a game I made for fun than something serious, I never intended to make money out of it.

Please download all files and put them together in a folder! 

 
I hope you enjoy the game^^
